title: Failure to Login, failure to recover account
body:
Account: PrinceNothing
I cannot login, when I try to find the account via the email receipts I have from RP purchases it directs me to a 'Cnaiur' account which I dont remember creating. When I attempt to recover account from the email I have associated with the account it gives yet another login name 'antoavestruz' of which is level 6 (might have been my first attempt at making a league account back in season 1?) 

Account: PrinceNothing has a lot....I mean A LOT of money put into it. I haven't been banned ever, Chatblocked or anything else. I have apprx 2 skins for every champ ( in which I own every champ and sometimes all of the skins for a champ since I spend what it would cost to have a WOW account per month, for five years, on Riot instead because I play quite a bit) and I cant even get a response from Riot. This is very frustrating.

I have RP receipts entitled to 'PrinceNothing' and transaction numbers as well. NOT to 'cnaiur'

replies.body:
We're unable to recover the account from here and it sounds like you've already submitted a ticket for recovery. You do have to provide all the information so that we're able to assist you in recovering the account. 

I would suggest taking an hour or so and going over the questions in the recovery process. Fill them out to the best of your knowledge and trying again!
bumping because of frustration. Id like any sort of reply.
